author: andschwa
body:
Need a NuGet package in windows-build that provides real MMI on Windows and stub on Linux.

/cc @dantraMSFT @fearthecowboy

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This is started with an [MMIN package](https://github.com/PowerShell/Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native) and [removal of the project](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/andschwa/package-mmin).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Further progress needs to be made by @dantraMSFT to use MMIN assemblies that work for our purposes (i.e. don't have the InternalsVisibleTo problem), as well as possibly package MMIN.Unmanaged.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Whoops, this was a duplicate of #760.

title: Move MMI/N out of tree and make NuGet package
